section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: SAE International is a global association and standards developing organization for engineering professionals in various industries. By uniting over 128,00 engineers and technical experts, SAE drives knowledge and expertise in the fields of automotive, aerospace and commercial vehicles. SAE International also devotes resources to projects and programs in STEM education, professional certification, and collegiate design competitions.
